miniEasyLocal++ documentation

Version 0.1

This set of pages contains an online reference manual of the EasyLocal++ framework. It is still incomplete, but we plan to extend it (hopefully) soon.

Further informations on how to employ the framework in the development of an actual application are available in the following paper:

  • L. Di Gaspero and A. Schaerf. EasyLocal++: an object-oriented framework for flexible design of local search algorithms. Research report UDMI/13/2000/RR, May 2000.
Some informations about how to compile an application that uses the framework classes can be found in the installation notes.

 
Go to: the Main Page of the documentation.
